trans-unit.source: Represents a column in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coluna num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewColumn class represents a logical column in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DataGridViewColumn representa uma coluna lógica num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve columns through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection of the control.
trans-unit.target: Pode obter colunas através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>coleção do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>, which contains the actual collection of cells in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, DataGridViewColumn is used mainly to adjust the appearance and behavior of the column user interface (UI), such as column width and cell style.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>, que contém a coleção de células na real um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, DataGridViewColumn é utilizada principalmente para ajustar o aspeto e o comportamento da interface de utilizador (IU), de coluna como o estilo de largura e da célula da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell styles, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os estilos de célula, consulte [estilos de célula no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Types that derive from DataGridViewColumn typically initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to a new instance of a related type derived from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> class.
trans-unit.target: Tipos que derivem de DataGridViewColumn normalmente inicializar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade para uma nova instância de um tipo relacionado derivado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any column properties that relate to the appearance or behavior of individual cells are wrappers for the corresponding properties of the template cell.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades de coluna relacionados com o aspeto ou comportamento de células individuais são wrappers para as propriedades correspondentes da célula de modelo.

trans-unit.source: Changing one of these properties on the column automatically changes the value on the cell template and on all cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: Alterar uma destas propriedades na coluna automaticamente altera o valor no modelo de célula e em todas as células na coluna.

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref> class to the default state.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"> </xref> classe para o estado predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref> class using an existing <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> as a template.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"> </xref> classe existente a utilizar <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> como um modelo.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to the value of the `cellTemplate` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade para o valor da `cellTemplate` parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: An existing <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> to use as a template.
trans-unit.target: Existente <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> para utilizar como um modelo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode by which the column automatically adjusts its width.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo pelo qual a coluna ajusta automaticamente largura.

trans-unit.source: The automatic sizing behavior of the column is determined by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A> property, which is the same as the value of the AutoSizeMode property for all values except <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, which indicates that the value is inherited from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property instead.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento de dimensionamento automático da coluna é determinado pelo valor o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A>propriedade, o que é o mesmo que o valor da propriedade AutoSizeMode para todos os valores, exceto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, que indica que o valor é herdado a partir de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade em vez disso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A> property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, the column is resized along with other columns in that mode.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A>valor da propriedade é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, a coluna é redimensionada juntamente com outras colunas em que modo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: All fill-mode columns in the control divide the available space in proportions determined by their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: Todas as colunas de modo de preenchimento no controlo dividem o espaço disponível nas proporções determinado pelo respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A>valores de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The width available for fill mode is determined by subtracting the widths of all other columns from the width of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: A largura disponível para o modo de preenchimento é determinada subtraindo as larguras de todas as outras colunas da largura da área do cliente do controlo.

trans-unit.source: If this width is smaller than the combined <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A> values of all fill-mode columns, the horizontal scroll bar is displayed, all fill-mode columns are shown with their minimum widths, and user column-resizing is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Se esta largura é menor do que o combinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A>valores de todas as colunas de modo de preenchimento, é apresentada a barra de deslocamento horizontal, todas as colunas de modo de preenchimento são apresentadas com os respetivos larguras mínimas e redimensionar coluna do utilizador é desativado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o modo de preenchimento da coluna, consulte [modo de preenchimento de coluna no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A> property is set to any other value except <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, the column will manage its width so that its cell values are fully displayed without clipping.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A>propriedade está definida como qualquer outro valor, exceto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, a coluna irão gerir a largura, para que os respetivos valores de célula são apresentados totalmente sem recorte.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: In content-based sizing modes, size adjustments occur whenever cell contents change or, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> is enabled, whenever row heights change.
trans-unit.target: Nos modos de dimensionamento baseada no conteúdo, ajustes de tamanho ocorrerem sempre que o conteúdo da célula alteração ou, se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>estiver ativada, sempre que alterar heights de linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some content-based sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance.
trans-unit.target: Alguns modos de dimensionamento baseada no conteúdo permitem-lhe limitar o ajuste de tamanho para as linhas actualmente apresentadas para aumentar o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: Only columns with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property value of `true` are resized, and changing the visibility of a column does not cause resizing to occur.
trans-unit.target: As colunas com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>valor da propriedade de `true` são redimensionado, e alterar a visibilidade da coluna não irá causar redimensionamento ocorra.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when columns are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the column widths with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, quando estão definidas para redimensionar automaticamente, o utilizador não é possível ajustar as larguras de coluna com o rato.

trans-unit.source: To adjust column widths programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> methods or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para ajustar programaticamente larguras de coluna, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>do controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>métodos ou a coluna de conjunto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre dimensionamento de automática baseada no conteúdo, consulte [opções de dimensionamento no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref> value that determines whether the column will automatically adjust its width and how it will determine its preferred width.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"> </xref> valor que determina se a coluna automaticamente a ajustar a largura e como determinará a largura preferencial.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref> that is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade é um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"> </xref> que não é válido.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property results in an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode*> value of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref> for a visible column when column headers are hidden. -or- The specified value when setting this property results in an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode*> value of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref> for a visible column that is frozen.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade resulta num <> </> *> valor <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"> </xref> para uma coluna visível quando cabeçalhos de coluna estão ocultas. - ou - o valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade resulta num <> </> *> valor <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"> </xref> para uma coluna visível que está fixa.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modelo utilizado para criar novas células.

trans-unit.source: The constructors for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class initialize this property.
trans-unit.target: Os construtores para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>classe inicializar esta propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: The default constructor sets the property to `null`; the other constructor copies the cell template from its parameter.
trans-unit.target: O construtor predefinido define a propriedade como `null`; de outro construtor copia o modelo de célula do seu parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alterar as propriedades do modelo de célula não imediatamente afetará a interface de utilizador (IU) das células da coluna existente.

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: Estas alterações são aparente apenas depois da coluna é novamente gerada (por exemplo, ao ordenar a coluna ou através de uma chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> que todos os outras células na coluna estão modeladas após.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the run-time type of the cell template.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de tempo de execução do modelo de célula.

trans-unit.source: The base type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the actual derived type.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para determinar o tipo derivado real.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> used as a template for this column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> utilizado como um modelo para esta coluna.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this band.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia desta banda exata.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o clonado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o menu de atalho para a coluna.

trans-unit.source: The shortcut menu appears when a user clicks the right mouse button in the column's display area.
trans-unit.target: O menu de atalho apresentada quando um utilizador clica no botão direito do rato na área de apresentação da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> associated with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> associado atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data source property or database column to which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref> is bound.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome da coluna de base de dados ou de propriedade da origem de dados para o qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"> </xref> está vinculado.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is set to `true`, each column automatically sets its DataPropertyName property to the name of a property or database column in the data source specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, cada coluna define automaticamente a respetiva propriedade DataPropertyName para o nome de uma coluna de base de dados ou de propriedade da origem de dados especificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: This binding can also be performed manually, which is useful when you want to display only a subset of the properties or database columns available in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Este enlace pode também ser executado manualmente, que é útil quando pretende apresentar apenas um subconjunto de propriedades ou colunas de base de dados disponíveis na origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: In such cases, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property to `false`, and then manually add each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>, setting the value of each DataPropertyName property to the properties or database columns in the data source that you want to display.
trans-unit.target: Nestes casos, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>propriedade `false`e, em seguida, adicionar manualmente cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>, definindo o valor de cada propriedade DataPropertyName às propriedades da base de dados ou colunas na origem de dados que pretende apresentar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The case-insensitive name of the property or database column associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome da coluna de base de dados ou de propriedade associado sensível a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de célula predefinido da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo mostra as células utilizando estilos indicados pela <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>propriedade, que herda estilos de outras propriedades do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> célula</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For cells in this column, the styles specified through the DefaultCellStyle property override the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, but are overridden by the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para as células nesta coluna, os estilos especificados através da propriedade DefaultCellStyle é substituem os estilos especificados através do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, mas são substituídas pelos estilos especificados através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [estilos de célula no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the default style of the cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo predefinido das células na coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display order of the column relative to the currently displayed columns.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a ordem de apresentação da coluna relativamente às colunas atualmente apresentadas.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> property, the DisplayIndex property corresponds to the current position of the column as displayed by the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>propriedade, a propriedade DisplayIndex corresponde à posição atual da coluna tal como apresentado pela interface de utilizador (IU).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, each column's DisplayIndex is set to numbers of increasing order, which reflects the order in which they were added.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, DisplayIndex cada coluna está definido como número de ordem crescente, o que reflete a ordem em que foram adicionados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property value does not affect the DisplayIndex value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>valor da propriedade não afeta o valor de DisplayIndex.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the display position of a column based on its visibility or other state, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetFirstColumn%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetLastColumn%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetNextColumn%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar a posição de visualização de uma coluna com base no respetiva visibilidade ou outro Estado, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetFirstColumn%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetLastColumn%2A>, ou no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetNextColumn%2A>método da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection>classe</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetNextColumn%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetLastColumn%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetFirstColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: Every column in the control has a unique DisplayIndex value.
trans-unit.target: Cada coluna no controlo tem um valor de DisplayIndex exclusivo.

trans-unit.source: The values start with 0 and proceed in numerical order without skipping any values.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de começar por 0 e prosseguir na ordem numérica sem ignorar quaisquer valores.

trans-unit.source: When you change the DisplayIndex value for a column, the DisplayIndex values for other columns are changed to reflect the new order.
trans-unit.target: Quando altera o valor de DisplayIndex de uma coluna, os valores de DisplayIndex para outras colunas são alterados para refletir a ordem de novo.

trans-unit.source: If the column has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, setting this property will cause the control to redraw itself.
trans-unit.target: Se a coluna tem uma associado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo, definir esta propriedade fará com que o controlo de redesenhar-se automaticamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position of the column as it is displayed in the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>, or -1 if the band is not contained within a control.
trans-unit.target: A posição da coluna como baseado em zero é apresentada no associada <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>, ou -1 se a banda não está contida dentro de um controlo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> and the specified value when setting this property is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the number of columns in the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView%2a?displayProperty=fullName> não é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> e o valor especificado quando esta propriedade é inferior a 0 ou maior que ou igual ao número de colunas no controlo.

trans-unit.source: -or- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> and the specified value when setting this property is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: - ou - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView%2A?displayProperty=fullName> é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> e o valor especificado quando esta propriedade é inferior a -1.

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified value when setting this property is equal to <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o valor especificado quando esta propriedade é igual a <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref> is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"> </xref> é eliminado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width, in pixels, of the column divider.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura, em pixels, no separador de coluna.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful to provide a visual boundary between frozen columns and columns that can scroll.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é útil para fornecer um limite visual entre as colunas que podem deslocar e colunas congeladas.

trans-unit.source: The extra edge is part of the current column, although it will take on the foreground color of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: O contorno adicional faz parte da coluna atual, embora demorará a cor de primeiro plano do associado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The extra edge does not extend the area in which users can double-click to automatically resize a column.
trans-unit.target: O contorno adicional não expande a área na qual, os utilizadores podem fazer duplo clique para redimensionar automaticamente uma coluna.

trans-unit.source: To resize a column, the user must double-click on the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column.
trans-unit.target: Redimensionar uma coluna, o utilizador tem faça duplo clique no limites entre o separador e a coluna adjacente.

trans-unit.source: The thickness, in pixels, of the divider (the column's right margin).
trans-unit.target: A espessura, em pixels, no separador (a coluna a margem direita).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the width of the column when it is in fill mode relative to the widths of other fill-mode columns in the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que representa a largura da coluna quando esta estiver no modo de preenchimento relativo para as larguras de outras colunas de modo de preenchimento no controlo.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A> property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, the column is resized along with other columns in that mode so that all visible columns in the control exactly fill the horizontal width of the available display area.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A>valor da propriedade é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, a coluna é redimensionada juntamente com outras colunas desse modo, para que todas as colunas visíveis no controlo preencher exatamente a largura horizontal da área de apresentação disponível.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: All fill-mode columns in the control divide the available space in proportions determined by their FillWeight property values.
trans-unit.target: O espaço disponível nas proporções determinado pelos respetivos valores de propriedade FillWeight de divisão de todas as colunas de modo de preenchimento no controlo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o modo de preenchimento da coluna, consulte [modo de preenchimento de coluna no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The maximum sum of FillWeight values for all columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is 65535.
trans-unit.target: A soma dos valores FillWeight para todas as colunas no máxima uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo está a 65535.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Single> representing the width of the column when it is in fill mode relative to the widths of other fill-mode columns.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Single>que representa a largura da coluna quando esta estiver no modo de preenchimento relativo para as larguras de outras colunas de modo de preenchimento.</xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: The default is 100.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 100.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade é menor ou igual a 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a column will move when a user scrolls the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se uma coluna será movida quando um utilizador desloca a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlar horizontalmente.

trans-unit.source: When a column is frozen, all the columns to its left (or to its right in right-to-left languages) are frozen as well.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma coluna está fixa, todas as colunas à esquerda (ou à direita em idiomas de direita para a esquerda) são interrompidas bem.

trans-unit.source: The frozen and unfrozen columns form two groups.
trans-unit.target: As colunas congeladas e libertadas formam dois grupos.

trans-unit.source: If column repositioning is enabled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns%2A> property to `true`, the user cannot drag a column from one group to the other.
trans-unit.target: Se o reposicionamento de coluna está ativada por definição o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns%2A>propriedade `true`, o utilizador não é possível arraste uma coluna de um grupo para outro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to freeze the column; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para parar a coluna; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the ideal width of the column based on the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: Calcula a ideal largura da coluna com base nos critérios especificados.

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the content-based automatic sizing feature of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to determine the ideal width of a column.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é utilizada pela funcionalidade baseada no conteúdo dimensionamento automático do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo para determinar a largura de uma coluna ideal.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A `fixedHeight` parameter value of `false` calculates the column width based on calculated row heights that will achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios.
trans-unit.target: A `fixedHeight` valor do parâmetro `false` calcula a largura da coluna com base no heights linha calculado que irão obter rácios de altura a largura da célula ideal.

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: Para o conteúdo da célula moldar em várias linhas, o estilo de célula em vigor para a célula tem de ter um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o dimensionamento automático, consulte [opções de dimensionamento no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref> value that specifies an automatic sizing mode.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"> </xref> valor que especifica um modo de dimensionamento automático.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to calculate the width of the column based on the current row heights; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to calculate the width with the expectation that the row heights will be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para calcular a largura da coluna com base no heights de linha atual; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para calcular a largura com as expectativas que serão ajustadas heights a linha.

trans-unit.source: The ideal width, in pixels, of the column.
trans-unit.target: A largura ideal, em pixels, da coluna.

trans-unit.source: autoSizeColumnMode is , , or .
trans-unit.target: autoSizeColumnModeis , , or .

trans-unit.source: autoSizeColumnMode is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: autoSizeColumnModeNão é um valor.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref> that represents the column header.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"> </xref> que representa o cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The header of a column is typically used to display a column label.
trans-unit.target: O cabeçalho de uma coluna é normalmente utilizado para apresentar uma etiqueta de coluna.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties, users can also click the column header to sort or select the column.
trans-unit.target: Consoante os valores atuais do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades, os utilizadores também podem clicar no cabeçalho da coluna para ordenar ou selecione a coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref> that represents the header cell for the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"> </xref> que representa a célula de cabeçalho da coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the caption text on the column's header cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto da legenda na célula do cabeçalho da coluna.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful only when the column has an associated header cell.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é útil apenas se a coluna tem uma célula de cabeçalho associado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.HeaderCellCore%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.HeaderCellCore%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.HeaderCellCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There is no corresponding header text property for rows.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Houver uma propriedade de texto do cabeçalho correspondente para linhas.

trans-unit.source: To display labels in row headers, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting?displayProperty=fullName> event and paint your own labels when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is -1.
trans-unit.target: Para apresentar as etiquetas nos cabeçalhos de linha, deve processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting?displayProperty=fullName>eventos e paint as suas próprias etiquetas quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é de -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> with the desired text.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>com o texto pretendido.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é uma cadeia vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets the sizing mode in effect for the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o modo de dimensionamento em vigor para a coluna.

trans-unit.source: The automatic sizing behavior of the column is determined by the value of the InheritedAutoSizeMode property, which is the same as the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property for all values except <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, which indicates that the value is inherited from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property instead.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento de dimensionamento automático da coluna é determinado pelo valor da propriedade InheritedAutoSizeMode, o que é o mesmo que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>propriedade para todos os valores, exceto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, que indica que o valor é herdado a partir de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade em vez disso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the InheritedAutoSizeMode property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, the column is resized along with other columns in that mode so that all visible columns in the control exactly fill the horizontal width of the available display area.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor de propriedade InheritedAutoSizeMode é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, a coluna é redimensionada juntamente com outras colunas desse modo, para que todas as colunas visíveis no controlo preencher exatamente a largura horizontal da área de apresentação disponível.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>

trans-unit.source: All fill-mode columns in the control divide the available space in proportions determined by their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: Todas as colunas de modo de preenchimento no controlo dividem o espaço disponível nas proporções determinado pelo respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A>valores de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o modo de preenchimento da coluna, consulte [modo de preenchimento de coluna no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When the InheritedAutoSizeMode property is set to any other value except <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, the column will manage its width so that its cell values are fully displayed without clipping.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade InheritedAutoSizeMode está definida como qualquer outro valor, exceto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, a coluna irão gerir a largura, para que os respetivos valores de célula são apresentados totalmente sem recorte.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>

trans-unit.source: In content-based sizing modes, size adjustments occur whenever cell contents change or, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> is enabled, whenever row heights change.
trans-unit.target: Nos modos de dimensionamento baseada no conteúdo, ajustes de tamanho ocorrerem sempre que o conteúdo da célula alteração ou, se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>estiver ativada, sempre que alterar heights de linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some content-based sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance.
trans-unit.target: Alguns modos de dimensionamento baseada no conteúdo permitem-lhe limitar o ajuste de tamanho para as linhas actualmente apresentadas para aumentar o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: Only columns with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property value of `true` are resized, and changing the visibility of a column does not cause resizing to occur.
trans-unit.target: As colunas com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>valor da propriedade de `true` são redimensionado, e alterar a visibilidade da coluna não irá causar redimensionamento ocorra.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when columns are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the column widths with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, quando estão definidas para redimensionar automaticamente, o utilizador não é possível ajustar as larguras de coluna com o rato.

trans-unit.source: To adjust column widths programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> methods or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para ajustar programaticamente larguras de coluna, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>do controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>métodos ou a coluna de conjunto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre dimensionamento de automática baseada no conteúdo, consulte [opções de dimensionamento no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref> value in effect for the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"> </xref> valor em vigor para a coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cell style currently applied to the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo de célula atualmente aplicado à coluna.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful to determine which cell styles are applied to all cells in a column regardless of any row styles that are also applied to the cells.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é útil para determinar os estilos de célula são aplicados a todas as células numa coluna, independentemente de quaisquer estilos de linha que também são aplicadas para as células.

trans-unit.source: The column InheritedStyle property inherits its values from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: A coluna InheritedStyle propriedade herda os respetivos valores do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a herança de estilo de célula, consulte [estilos de célula no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the cell style used to display the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo de célula utilizado para apresentar a coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the column is bound to a data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a coluna está vinculada a uma origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: A column becomes bound to a data source if it is part of a data-bound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Uma coluna torna-se vinculada a uma origem de dados se faz parte de um vinculados a dados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A column can become part of a data-bound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> if the column is automatically created when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is set to `true`, or if the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> property is set when the column is manually added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Uma coluna pode tornar-se parte de um vinculados a dados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>se a coluna é criada automaticamente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, ou se de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>propriedade é definida quando a coluna é adicionada manualmente para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> a coluna</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the column is connected to a data source; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a coluna está ligada a uma origem de dados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum width, in pixels, of the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura mínima, em pixels, da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The MinimumWidth property sets a limit on how narrow the column can be resized in the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: A propriedade MinimumWidth define um limite de estreito como a coluna pode ser redimensionada na interface de utilizador (IU).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A> property can override the MinimumWidth property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A>propriedade pode substituir a propriedade MinimumWidth.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels, from 2 to <xref:System.Int32>, that specifies the minimum width of the column.
trans-unit.target: O número de pixels, de 2 para <xref:System.Int32>, que especifica a largura mínima da coluna.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The default is 5.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 5.

trans-unit.source: The value is less than 2 or greater than <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O valor é inferior a 2 ou superior a <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome da coluna.

trans-unit.source: This property represents a formal name associated with the column that can be used to identify the column in a collection.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa um nome formal associado à coluna que pode ser utilizada para identificar a coluna de uma coleção.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Contains%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection> class use the Name property.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Contains%2A>métodos para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection>classe utilizar a propriedade Name.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Contains%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: O nome é sensível.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> will treat `column1` and `COLUMN1` as the same column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>irão tratar `column1` e `COLUMN1` como a mesma coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the name of the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém o nome da coluna.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é uma cadeia vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can edit the column's cells.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o utilizador pode editar as células da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The ReadOnly property affects the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of each cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: Afeta de propriedade só de leitura a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>a propriedade de cada célula da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user cannot edit the column's cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o utilizador não é possível editar as células da coluna; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for a column that is bound to a read-only data source.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para uma coluna que está vinculada a uma origem de dados só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column is resizable.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a coluna é redimensionável.

trans-unit.source: If the Resizable property is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, the user will not be able to manually adjust the column width.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade redimensionável for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, o utilizador não poderá manualmente ajustar a largura da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: By default, the Resizable property value is based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeColumns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o valor da propriedade redimensionável baseia-se no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeColumns%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeColumns%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you explicitly set Resizable to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, however, the control value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se definir explicitamente Resizable para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, no entanto, o valor do controlo é ignorado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: Set Resizable to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> to restore the value-inheritance behavior.
trans-unit.target: Definir Resizable <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>para restaurar o comportamento de herança de valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> restores the value inheritance, the Resizable property will never return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> value unless the column has not been added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Porque <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>restaura a herança de valor, a propriedade redimensionável nunca irá devolver um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>valor, a menos que a coluna não foi adicionada a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: If you need to determine whether the Resizable property value of a column is inherited, check its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se precisar de determinar se o valor da propriedade redimensionável de uma coluna é herdado, verifique o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A> property value includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates> flag, the Resizable property value is not inherited.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>valor da propriedade inclui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates>sinalizador, o valor da propriedade redimensionável não é herdada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the site of the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o site da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref> associated with the column, if any.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"> </xref> associada à coluna, se aplicável.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the sort mode for the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo de ordenação para a coluna.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is sorted using a column with a SortMode property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, a sorting glyph is automatically displayed in the column header.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo é ordenado com uma coluna com um valor de propriedade SortMode de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, um ordenação glifo é automaticamente apresentado no cabeçalho da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Starting in the [!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/add/includes/net-2015-md.md)], the sorting glyph is resized according to the system DPI settings when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` When the control is sorted using a column with a SortMode property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A partir de [!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/add/includes/net-2015-md.md)], o ordenação glifo é redimensionado, de acordo com as definições do sistema DPI quando o ficheiro App. config contém a seguinte entrada: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` quando o controlo é ordenado com uma coluna com um valor de propriedade SortMode de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, deve apresentar o ordenação glifo através o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: O modo de ordenação predefinido de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for other column types is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: O modo de ordenação predefinido para outros tipos de coluna é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: The SortMode value does not prevent you from sorting a column programmatically, although other restrictions may apply.
trans-unit.target: O valor de SortMode não impedir a ordenação uma coluna programaticamente, embora poderão são aplicáveis outras restrições.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: A SortMode property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> will not prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick?displayProperty=fullName> event from occurring, but it will prevent the header from changing its appearance when it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Um valor da propriedade SortMode de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>não irá impedir que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick?displayProperty=fullName>evento ocorrer, mas irá impedir que o cabeçalho de alterar o aspeto quando é clicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode"></xref> that specifies the criteria used to order the rows based on the cell values in a column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode"> </xref> que especifica os critérios utilizados para ordenar as linhas com base nos valores de célula numa coluna.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property conflicts with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode*>.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído aos conflitos de propriedade com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text used for ToolTips.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto utilizado para descrições.

trans-unit.source: The column's ToolTip displays when the mouse pointer rests on the column header.
trans-unit.target: Descrição da coluna apresentada quando o ponteiro do rato assenta no cabeçalho da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The text to display as a ToolTip for the column.
trans-unit.target: O texto a apresentar como uma descrição para a coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia que descreve a coluna.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui o <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The returned string contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia devolvida contém as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>as propriedades da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que descreve a coluna.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data type of the values in the column's cells.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de dados dos valores em células da coluna.

trans-unit.source: This property is used when filtering or sorting the columns with respect to the contents of their cells.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é utilizada quando filtrar ou ordenar as colunas no que respeita aos conteúdos dos respetivos células.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that describes the run-time class of the values stored in the column's cells.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>que descreve a classe de tempo de execução de valores armazenados nas células da coluna.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a coluna está visível.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to hide a column from view while keeping the column in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para ocultar uma coluna da vista enquanto mantém a coluna no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To completely remove a column, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para remover completamente uma coluna, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To hide a column that is automatically generated when binding to a data source, set this property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para ocultar uma coluna que é gerada automaticamente quando o enlace a uma origem de dados, definir esta propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete>processador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the column is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a coluna está visível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current width of the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura actual da coluna.

trans-unit.source: If the specified value when setting this property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A> property value is used instead.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade é inferior ao valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A>propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A>valor da propriedade é utilizado em vez disso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the column.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The default is 100.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 100.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is greater than 65536.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade é superior a 65536.
